osvSchema.details: MP4Box GPAC version 2.3-DEV-rev636-gfbd7e13aa-master was discovered to contain an infinite loop in the function av1_uvlc at media_tools/av_parsers.c. This vulnerability allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted MP4 file.

description_data.value: MP4Box GPAC version 2.3-DEV-rev636-gfbd7e13aa-master was discovered to contain an infinite loop in the function av1_uvlc at media_tools/av_parsers.c. This vulnerability allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted MP4 file.

descriptions.value: MP4Box GPAC version 2.3-DEV-rev636-gfbd7e13aa-master was discovered to contain an infinite loop in the function av1_uvlc at media_tools/av_parsers.c. This vulnerability allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted MP4 file.

Se descubrió que MP4Box GPAC versión 2.3-DEV-rev636-gfbd7e13aa-master contiene un bucle infinito en la función av1_uvlc en media_tools/av_parsers.c. Esta vulnerabilidad permite a los atacantes provocar una denegación de servicio (DoS) a través de un archivo MP4 manipulado.
